But <S%H1840>Daniel<s%> <S%H7760>made<s%> up his <S%H3820>mind<s%> that he would not <S%H1351>defile<s%> himself with the king's <S%H6598>choice<s%> <S%H6598>food<s%> or with the <S%H3196>wine<s%> <S%H4960>which<s%> he <S%H4960>drank;<s%> so he <S%H1245>sought<s%> [permission] from the <S%H8269>commander<s%> of the <S%H5631>officials<s%> that he might not <S%H1351>defile<s%> himself.

Then you would make me <S%H2325>forfeit<s%> my <S%H7218>head<s%> to the <S%H4428>king.<s%>"

But <S%H1840>Daniel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4453>overseer<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H8269>commander<s%> of the <S%H5631>officials<s%> had <S%H4487>appointed<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H1840>Daniel,<s%> <S%H2608>Hananiah,<s%> <S%H4332>Mishael<s%> and <S%H5838>Azariah,<s%>

<S%H4994>"Please<s%> <S%H5254>test<s%> your <S%H5650>servants<s%> for <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> and let us be <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> <S%H2235>vegetables<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H4325>water<s%> to <S%H8354>drink.<s%>

So he <S%H8085>listened<s%> to them in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>matter<s%> and <S%H5254>tested<s%> them for <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

And at the <S%H7117>end<s%> of <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> their <S%H4758>appearance<s%> <S%H7200>seemed<s%> <S%H2896>better<s%> and they were <S%H1277>fatter<s%> <S%H1320><s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3206>youths<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> had been <S%H398>eating<s%> the king's <S%H6598>choice<s%> <S%H6598>food.<s%>

Then at the <S%H7117>end<s%> of the <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> had <S%H559>specified<s%> for <S%H935>presenting<s%> them, the <S%H8269>commander<s%> of the <S%H5631>officials<s%> <S%H935>presented<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar.<s%>
